class motornet.tasks.DelayedReach(network, **kwargs)#

Bases: motornet.tasks.Task

A random-delay reach to a random target from a random starting position.

Parameters

delay_range â€“ Two-items list or numpy.array that indicate the minimum and maximum value of the delay timer. The delay is randomly drawn from a uniform distribution bounded by these values.
